## EventFrom type

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type EventFrom<T, K extends Prop<TEvent, 'type'> = never, TEvent extends EventObject = ResolveEventType<T>> = IsNever<K> extends true ? TEvent : ExtractEvent<TEvent, K>;
```
